# =================================
# TwoFus
#
# TwoFus/externals/CMakeLists.txt
# ================================

include(ExternalProject)

SET(TWOFUS_DEPENDENCIES)

include(zlib.cmake)
LIST(APPEND TWOFUS_DEPENDENCIES ${ZLIB_PROJECT})
include(bamtools.cmake)
LIST(APPEND TWOFUS_DEPENDENCIES ${BAMTOOLS_PROJECT})
include(fastahack.cmake)
LIST(APPEND TWOFUS_DEPENDENCIES ${FASTAHACK_PROJECT})

SET(TWOFUS_SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/external CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)
SET(TWOFUS_EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/externals/twofus_external_project CACHE INTERNAL "")
SET(TWOFUS_EXTERNAL_PROJECT twofus CACHE INTERNAL "")

ExternalProject_Add(${TWOFUS_EXTERNAL_PROJECT}
	DEPENDS ${TWOFUS_DEPENDENCIES}
	DOWNLOAD_COMMAND ""
	SOURCE_DIR ${TWOFUS_SOURCE_DIR}
	BINARY_DIR ${TWOFUS_EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR}/bin
	INSTALL_COMMAND ""
	UPDATE_COMMAND ""
	CMAKE_CACHE_ARGS
		-DCMAKE_C_COMPILER:STRING=${CMAKE_C_COMPILER}
				-DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER:STRING=${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER}
)
